sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A congratulatory poem to the Right Honourable Sir William Pritchard, Lord Mayor of the City of London
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed for P. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball, near the Hospital-gate, in West-Smithfield, [London] : 1682.
Verse - "In that great train which loudly does reherse". Place of publication from Wing. L Copy has annotation: 30. Octob. 1682.; stained at head. Reproduction of the original in: British Library; Henry E. Huntington Library.
=======

Verse - "In that great train which loudly does reherse". Place of publication from Wing. L Copy has annotation: 30. Octob. 1682.; stained at head. Reproduction of the original in: British Library; Henry E. Huntington Library.
P. Brooksby
the Golden-Ball, near the Hospital-gate, in West-Smithfield
